name: James Lick Middle School
description: Serves: Middle School James Lick Middle School is a comprehensive middle school in the heart of San Francisco in Noe Valley. Students experience an extensive academic program, with an emphasis in the visual and performing arts, that encourages them to explore and develop their varied talents. JLMS is the proud home of a thriving Spanish immersion program and a community of dedicated and passionate educators.
